physical_appearance: The image shows a colour photograph. It depicts a group of five men. All of them are looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured. Three of them are sitting down while the other two are standing at the back. All of them are wearing shirts and all but one of them are bespectacled.
sgcool_label_text:
This Polacolor photograph shows a group of five men, including at bottom right Mr Lee Kip Lee, shipping businessman and president of the Peranakan Association. 

Polacolor was an instant film introduced by the Polaroid Company in 1963.
title_text: Photograph of a group of five men including Lee Kip Lee
subject_terms_2: Colour photography Portrait photography Portraits, Group Men Lee, Kip Lee, 1922-
